title: Muslim Ban / Travel Ban (Executive Order 13769)
summary: Trump signed Executive Order banning citizens from 7 Muslim-majority countries for 90 days and suspending refugee resettlement for 120 days. Thousands detained at airports, massive protests erupted nationwide. Multiple federal courts blocked versions. Supreme Court eventually upheld modified version 5-4 in 2018.
keyFacts: Banned citizens from 7 Muslim-majority countries (Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Yemen) for 90 days
Suspended refugee resettlement for 120 days; indefinitely banned Syrian refugees
Thousands of travelers detained at airports; families separated
Massive protests erupted at airports nationwide
Multiple federal courts blocked versions of the ban
Supreme Court eventually upheld modified version 5-4 in 2018 (Trump v. Hawaii)
